name: astrosteveo-plugins
description: A collection of Claude plugins developed by astrosteveo to enhance productivity and project management.

plugins.name: agile-workflow
plugins.description: A plugin to assist with agile project management tasks such as sprint planning, user story creation, and task tracking.

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developing Claude Code plugins. Includes 7 expert skills covering hooks, MCP integration, commands, agents, and best practices. AI-assisted plugin creation and validation.
